Reviews.Title: Great!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Scipio Africanus
Reviews.Content: Now I usually don't write product reviews. But in this case I will make an exception. Simply because I know how frustrating that it can be purchasing a "QUALITY"  laptop on a limited budget.... Now I have used and am familiar with HP's, Dell, Toshiba, Acer, and  etc., etc, and for the sake of continuity I will not include in my review any experience I have with Apple being as it's a completely different O.S., but that being said..... I love apple and I love this Lenovo. As I've stated I am on a limited budget and I desperately needed a quality  laptop for a good price. Now I don't know about most consumers but if I'm going to fork out ANY of my hard earned money I am going to make sure I do an extensive amount of research.Especially when it is potentially hundreds of dollars. That being said. I did this and if you are like me even that is not enough... Trusting other people and biased reviews and such. But with this computer I searched high and low for a great "fit" in terms of performance, functionality and all around usefulness and I took a chance on this one. By taking a chance I mean I had never used any lenovo product  but being as they are consistently rated in the highest echelon of laptop manufacturers I took the leap and I must say that all around (for the price range, and even significantly above) this is the best lap-top I've ever used. The Keyboard is phenomenal, the functionality, and ease of use is just great. The only Gripe I have and I mean the only is the fact that a significant number of programs that have been standard on previous lap-tops I've used " I.E. microsoft word, office, etc." do not come with the laptop but in trial version only. All in All great computer, extremely fast, durable and funtional I hope you enjoy

Reviews.Title: Fulfilled my all requirements and perfect piece
Reviews.Author: AMIT KULKARNI
Reviews.Content: Laptop is very good.. Look and processing speed is fast.Only thing is they are not providing Operating system CD and registered antivirus in pack.. You have to buy it separately.

Reviews.Title: Can't go wrong
Reviews.Author: Jay Alberino
Reviews.Content: I spent weeks researching computers with help from some experts and this laptop was brought to my attention. It was by far the best deal that I found. I was looking at Dell Inspiron's on Amazon for roughly the same price, but they either lacked the processing power (1.5Ghz) or had far less memory and/or hard drive space (this one has ~750gb).I only received this yesterday, but so far it has been an excellent purchase for the money.I did hear lots of negative things about Windows 8, but so far I'm surprised to say that I like it. I hear that Windows 8.1 update will come on 10/17/13 so hopefully that will add back the start button.The touchpad on this computer allows for a 2 finger scroll, but it is reverse direction and should be able to be set to regular. Minor issue, but I hear this will be fixed if it hasn't been already. In the meantime, I'm getting used to scrolling like I do on a smartphone.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Hannah Williams
Reviews.Content: This was purchased fro my son to use in school who has a learning disability.  It needed to run several programs to assist him in school.  It had plenty of storage and runs great with them.  He loves it and so do we

Reviews.Title: Great Purchase
Reviews.Author: Justin
Reviews.Content: Going into college I needed a good computer but for a relatively low price. I settled on this one and have not been disappointed yet. This is by far the best computer I have ever used, Macs included. I have had it for a year and a half now and haven't had a single problem yet. Also, all of my friends have really expensive computers and mine is still faster and in many cases has more useful features. I use this thing every day from anywhere around 3-6 hours a day doing all kinds of different things and it handles it all superbly. I highly recommend this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Just as advertised
Reviews.Author: eira
Reviews.Content: The product was exactly as advertised. My husband was very exciting, he is using it as a gaming computer and it works very well. the little mousepad is annoying, but otherwise it's great. Oh and I got it like....five? days earlier than anticipated, so that was crazy awesome.overall, I would recommend both the product and seller.

Reviews.Title: Lenovo
Reviews.Author: Skeri
Reviews.Content: Got my computer in one piece I was afraid of it being shipped all the way to Hawaii it would get damaged. But they packed it neatly and the laptop itself loved it but windows 8 takes some getting use to kinda annoying in a way.

Reviews.Title: Some things could be better, but overall it's a very satisfying laptop
Reviews.Author: Stephanie
Reviews.Content: This laptop has a nice look with its aluminium finish, the speaker grille looks specially nice since it's very smooth and has a deep gray color. The power button is also a detail that gives it a more premium appearance. Another cool detail is the row of touch sensitive under the screen. This laptop has also got a very nice and responsive keyboard. The integrated HD 4000 graphics respond very well to rendering when it's not an extremely demanding game, for example. On the down side, the display's brightest setting isn't that bright, sometimes I'd like to have more brightness available, but it depends on the kind of lighting your under. Since this laptop hasn't got a unibody and is formed from different pieces, it's very easy for it to accumulate dust. The aluminum finish does give it a nice look but it definitely attracts fingerprints easily. Finally, we have to mention the sound, the sound does have a cool surround effect, and the dolby home thater feature is very nice when you want to personally adjust your music settings and save your different profiles, the only bad thing is that the sounds are sometimes a bit tinny, depending on what your playing. Overall it performs well, fast enough, not blazingly fast obviously, looks nice, sounds overall nice and I'm happy with my laptop!

Reviews.Title: Great deal...dispite my K button does not always work.
Reviews.Author: Garrett
Reviews.Content: Great deal... super fast.. K button on the key board has to pressed several time to work... Windows 8 will make you want to pull your hair out at first... you get a refurbished computer... you gotta expect something gonna be wrong. You just hope it's not major in the long run... still running good.. I'm just glad  it's the K button...If it was a vowel like A or E or I...then that would be different story...

Reviews.Title: Great Laptop
Reviews.Author: wdp1976
Reviews.Content: This product is a great value. I purchased one on Sunday, after having sold it to numerous people through our store. It is fast, sleek, quiet, and great visuals. I play games, and Rift runs on medium-high settings with no chopping. The only down side is the touch pad so I disabled it and use a mouse. I recommend this product to anyone looking for a great PC for a great price.

8GB DDR3 Memory/5 in 1 (SD/SDPRO/MMC/MS PRO/XD) card reader/Intel Integrated HD 4000/802.11b/g/n Wi-Fi
750GB 5400RPM Hard Drive/Ports: Stereo headphone jack and mic jack,VGA, HDMI, RJ-45/2x USB 3.0 and 2x USB 2.0
15.6" HD LED-backlit display (1366x768)/Integrated DVD reader/writer/6 cell lithium ion Battery up to 5 hour battery life/
Built in WebCam/Integrated stereo speakers (2x2W) with Dolby Home Theater v4/ Dimention:- 14.8" x 9.8" x 1.3"/ Weight:-m 5.84 lbs
ProductInfo.Name: Lenovo IdeaPad Z580 20135 15.6" HD LED Laptop, 3rd Gen. i5-3210M 2.5Ghz Processor, 8GB RAM, 750GB HDD, Windows 8 Color; Grey
